summary: THE TIRE SALESPERSON INFORMED CONSUMER THAT TIRES ON VEHICLE WERE IMPROPER, AND THEY WOULD SHRED OR FALL APART.   *LA   IT WAS HARD TO SUSTAIN THE VEHICLE WHEN THE TIRE SEPARATED FROM THE VEHICLE.  (GUARDIAN TIRES)   *SC     *JB
